questions.question: So if you look, how did the sport change from 80s, 90s to the aughts?
I'd say kind of a rule is whatever you do, you get better at, right?
In arm wrestling, when you're at the top of the world, where does that come from?
How did that feel in the moments after, in the days after, in the months after, in the years after?
I mean, do you, how can, are you okay with the endurance aspect of this?
What was the things you loved craftsmanship-wise, like fun things you get to do, learn and challenge yourself?
What are the different styles that you can speak to that people that don't know arm wrestling could understand?
I mean, if someone would pose it to you, do you want to live forever?
